name: Baren's Survival
description:
Baren's Survival (Demo)

Is a multiplayer survivial game developed by 1 man.
The ideas are coming from Jackboi's stream https://www.twitch.tv/jackboi everyone is welcome to come with designs/ideas to the game :)

The game is a multiplayer survival game and still needs some work here and there. The players job is try to survive and uncover the secret of why they are on the island and what happend? 

The reason its on here, is so everyone that have been a small part of it can try it and maybe come with better ideas to the game
please go to https://www.twitch.tv/jackboi if u want to follow the game or maybe be part of the it :D

I will try to update the game as much as possible. use the app https://itch.io/app too get the updates automaticly. 

Controls:
W Key: To walk forward 
S Key: To walk backwards
D Key: To walk to the right
A Key: To walk to the left
V Key: To switch camera
Shift Key: To run
Esc Key: To open menu
use the mouse to look around

!!Only on Windows 64-bit!!
